StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: Unlock_SP
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source:
create or replace PROCEDURE Unlock_SP
(
ACCOUNTID_IN IN NUMBER,
REASONID_IN IN NUMBER,
RESULTS OUT NUMBER
)
AS

BEGIN
UPDATE Accounts
SET LockStatus = 'N'
WHERE Accounts.ID = ACCOUNTID_IN;
INSERT INTO LockEvents (Accounts_ID, EventType, EventReasons_ID) VALUES (ACCOUNTID_IN, 'U', REASONID_IN);
RESULTS := 1;

EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS THEN
RESULTS := 2;

END Unlock_SP;
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.body:
create or replace PROCEDURE Unlock_SP
(
ACCOUNTID_IN IN NUMBER,
REASONID_IN IN NUMBER,
RESULTS OUT NUMBER
)
AS

BEGIN
UPDATE Accounts
SET LockStatus = 'N'
WHERE Accounts.ID = ACCOUNTID_IN;
INSERT INTO LockEvents (Accounts_ID, EventType, EventReasons_ID) VALUES (ACCOUNTID_IN, 'U', REASONID_IN);
RESULTS := 1;

EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS THEN
RESULTS := 2;

END Unlock_SP;
